website_summaries.verdict: From filers who’ve got a side job to those who run a corporation (and file personal and self-employed taxes together), this software is comprehensive and excellent.
pros: Best for small business owners, freelancers, and those who receive income from a side job
Updates automatically to keep tax forms in line with tax law
cons: A solid product with little to complain about overall

customer_reviews.title: New out of the box and won't Activate
customer_reviews.text: I've used TurboTax for over 10 years and this is a first. When I installed and entered the activation code from inside the sealed box, I go this -"The license code you entered is not valid. Error code: 606". I've attempted to contact Intuit, but inconveniently they have no help outside M-F business hours. I think this disk is going back for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: JohnB087

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: I have used Turbo Tax for years up until now was a superior program. This edition is pure junk. I had to start and restart the program numerous times. Finally go ti to load the program. Started a new tax for 2019. IT DID NOT ASK OR ALLOW PREVIOUS YEARS INFORMATION. In fact it gets into continual useless loops demands to install updates then quits working. Who ever wrote the program for this should be fired. It does not work
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Jerry Stettheimer

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY THIS UNTIL TURBOTAX FIXES IT!
customer_reviews.text: BEWARE ! DISC and DOWNLOAD versions do not work here. Software updates and then TurboTax goes completely BLANK. Customer service has no idea what is happening and said the DISC / DOWNLOAD from AMAZON appears to be DEFECTIVE. *** Don't buy this product until they fix the problem(s). This from a long time TurboTax user . . . . ***
customer_reviews.author: Verified TurboTAX User

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: Completely useless. License code didn't work during 2 attempts at installation from disk and failed again using the download instructions.
customer_reviews.author: starsfans1

customer_reviews.title: It works with Windows 7 !!!
customer_reviews.text: I`m using Turbo Tax for last 3 years without problems. This year I was nervous as I order it and as in reviews folks stating that it not work with Windows 7. Hour ago I was like, shoud I return it without try to install based on reviews and system requirements printed on disk package whitch says Windows 8 or higher? Well I try and installation want smoothly without any problem. I`m very satisfied. Sad thing is that next year I will have to use my son`s computer to file a tax, because I do not want Windows 8 or 10 on my computer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Requires Product Activation
customer_reviews.text: This 2019 Turbotax requires product key and activation. Had I known this, I would have not purchased Turbotax. The activation has issues in having to be reentered in the same PC. Boycott TurboTax and purchase something else.
customer_reviews.author: orb0554

customer_reviews.title: The best Tax program
customer_reviews.text: Over the years we usually used Turbotax, every once in awhile trying the competition and then coming back to this. IT just works . They update it regularly which is another feature that i like. I have never had a problem with a tax return and the one year I was audited, it ended up with no change.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: TurboTax 2019 Will Work On Windows 7
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned about installing TurboTax Home and Business 2019 on my PC with Windows 7 after reading about problems by other reviewers. I turned off my antivirus (PCMatic) and the installation went perfectly. I have not done my 2019 taxes yet but this is the 8th year I have used TurboTax and have been totally satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: stevan

customer_reviews.title: Next year H&R Block Software
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this software for years, yesterday I started up the program and it wanted to do a software check, to make sure all the forms were up to date, I didn't think anything of it until I had to put in the activation code, that is when I realized that the software had absolutely erased all the work I had done the week before, I was ready to pull my last bits of hair out when I thought maybe they will help, hah, their customer support is next to impossible to obtain, now I have to re-enter everything from day one, frustration is not the word...
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Not user friendly at all!
customer_reviews.text: 1. Does not remember license key. Have to keep entering every time I open the program. 2. When opening my 2018 return, I am forced to endure an update although the return was already filed months ago.
customer_reviews.author: Phil from Albuquerque

customer_reviews.title: shame on intuit and amazon.
customer_reviews.text: Well, you already know Intuit, the maker of turbotax spends millions lobbying congress to keep the tax code as convoluted as possible so you "have to" purchase this rubbish software just to navigate the minefields of tax code. However, this review is on the lunacy of intuit and amazon using so much unnecessary packaging: ahard plastic case, followed by a paper sleeve, and finalized by bubble/paper mailer....all for a single CD. next year how about a novel idea, and putting the CD in a paper sleeve that amazon can stick our address on when mailing ? selfish intuit, and reckless amazon using this much packaging for a single CD. shameful.
customer_reviews.author: rjs

customer_reviews.title: No Way to Import From QuickBooks Self Employed
customer_reviews.text: I have QuickBooks Self Employed Online, which I've been using to manage my side business all year. From QuickBooks Self Employed Online, you can export your data to TurboTax, but only to the Online version, not to the version for sale here, which you install on your computer. QuickBooks Self Employed Online can export a .xls file with your tax data, but TurboTax Home and Business desktop cannot import the file. If you call support, you're in queue for 10 minutes before being connected to someone with a thick Indian accent and tons of background noise who doesn't actually resolve the problem. This product is a complete waste of money if you use Inuit QuickBooks Self Employed Online.
customer_reviews.author: Slick7759

customer_reviews.title: Not the Turbo Tax quality I expect
customer_reviews.text: I have used Turbo Tax for many, many years with no problems. This year that is NOT the case. I end up going back and having to find where to enter things that I have entered in previous years such as Education tuition and expenses. When I click on help, I get these small printed explanations that really do nothing to "help" me. When I try to research my questions, I get a lot of FAQ, not the exact information I am requesting. I am hoping that Turbo Tax improves this product with online updates before I actually file my return.
customer_reviews.author: mjzHouston, Texas

customer_reviews.title: Someone Dropped the Ball on this one.
customer_reviews.text: Don't know who exactly. Either seller ,Win 10 or maker of the product. But I have never had so many issues . Program never asked for code upon install, State was already showing downloaded (not MINE) . Had to spend hours between tech support and emails, downloads etc. to get it corrected , still not sure if I even trust it now. What a shame Ive used this software for years and have always recommended it to everyone. Always got the CD never liked downloaded version and now stuck with download version because Disc is useless.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keeps asking for activation-Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: If you have not yet purchased this software, do NOT buy it!! I have used TurboTax for years but Never again! You cannot use it unless you enter the activation code each time you launch the program so keep your number with you. You only get 5 times to launch it before TurboTax locks you out. $100.00 piece of software that is basically not useable. Customer Service/Tech support don't seem to think it's a problem. TurboTax has been around for a very long time and used to be an excellent product. You would think they would test their software before rolling it out and putting their customers through this.
customer_reviews.author: MAHA

customer_reviews.title: Turbotax is now charging $39.99 to process refunds
customer_reviews.text: Turbotax offers one free federal filing included with the price of the software. In prior years any refund would be electronically deposited. Today, they informed me that there's a "new" $39.99 charge to process the refund, which is charged by a third party. This information isn't provided until the very last step of filing. After 10 years, this is likely my last year using their software.
customer_reviews.author: luna

customer_reviews.title: Sucks. Looks like I'll be switching programs.
customer_reviews.text: I have correct a 1099 from 2017 but TT wouldn't let me do it til I bought the most recent version (2019) so I did. I still can't correct the 2017 form, I can't e-file this year's, I can't email them either because it saves all the forms together and I can't separate them. "Help" feature is useless. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren S.

customer_reviews.title: Good product do not be misled by offer of multiple downloads
customer_reviews.text: When you order the CD version, it says you can install the software from the CD and other copies via online. The wording on the box says you can "Install in up to 5 of your computers". THIS IS A LIE. I had no trouble doing the CD installation, but you actually cannot install other versions. I called customer service, and after an hour with the support representative offering suggestions, trying things and speaking to her supervisor, the bottom line is the software can only be installed from the CD you purchased, but you cannot download other copies online. I'd call this false marketing. I'll let others decide what they'd call it.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Livingston

customer_reviews.title: Works really well for most people
customer_reviews.text: Check over the additions available make sure you get the one for yourself that you need but haven’t had any problems with using TurboTax in the past and I don’t see any problems with using it for this year either! It automatically will ask you to update it as soon as you install it for the latest tax things that have been put into the system so you’re covered! Pretty easy to use if you can do some data entry.
customer_reviews.author: Kinghazzah

customer_reviews.title: Long time user, not thrilled about needing a passcode to install it, and it keeps wanting to update.
customer_reviews.text: It installed cleanly, and I let it update the first time I ran it. However, it keeps wanting to update every time I start it, and according to other users, that counts as an installation. The problem is, you only get 5 installations. So, I don't let it update again, and everything is fine. We filed for an extension, and maybe, when we are ready to do the actual taxes, I'll let it do another update, and use up another installation. Maybe. Otherwise, this year's version has the same look and feel as last year's. I do like being able to download my pay stub, as well as my investments, instead of having to type everything in.
customer_reviews.author: Crash and Burn

customer_reviews.title: INCOME TAX PREPARATION PROGRAM
customer_reviews.text: Program is up-to-date on IRS tax rules/changes for 2019. In that I have always worked thru preparing a tax return that included small business information, I had to study/research the IRS rules each year -- hoping that I understood the information. Having done my taxes for years -- on my own -- gave me a good understanding of TurboTax questions and the program's results. The program has eliminated the headaches out of doing the tax return and gives one the assurance that the return is done correctly! An additional note: Program allows for those that operate off "Windows 7." Notes that 2019 is the last year for working off "Windows 7."
customer_reviews.author: Donna Sumler

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy 2019 home and business for Mac.  Turbo Tax acknowledges they are having problems.
customer_reviews.text: Almost done with my taxes this year and TT failed to open. It is stuck in a loop - all it will do is download the update...it will not run. My taxes have been lost. TT told me to download the tax software. I did. Same problem. Now they want me to buy it a higher price as on-line version with no free state file. They acknowledge there is a problem with mac 2019 version...yet they are still selling it. do not Buy!
customer_reviews.author: robert

customer_reviews.title: Extremely easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I got this software, the first time I was very scared and took a lot of time because I wanted to be precise with everything, this time I purchased through amazon because it had the best price. This time it was waaay easier to use because turbotax saves a lot of your information from last year if you used the software, so it was so easy, took way less time and me and my wife could do our taxes at the same time (married jointly) Turbotax charges to file state tax but its very simple and easy. We are going to keep using turbotax for the future and keep buying it from amazon.
customer_reviews.author: ernesto v.

customer_reviews.title: Gone Downhill
customer_reviews.text: A long a difficult install process that now includes a serial number. There really needs to be more competition in tax prep software.
customer_reviews.author: Tunes

customer_reviews.title: Used TurboTax since mid 1980's
customer_reviews.text: Has always done the job but forced to upgrade to more complex/costly versions as the ability to handle stocks was dropped from earlier versions. Also, single "free" state filing is not free unless hard copy. My state requires online filing if federal is online so get around $25 turbotax fee (for simple 4 page form) by printing hard copy version for myself and copying info onto state online website. Only concern so far this year has been the failure/interruption of large updates due to my slow/intermittent internet service in a very rural area. Like feature of importing last year's info and accessing brokerage accounts to import capital gains, dividends, and other info.
customer_reviews.author: Earl Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Be Careful with Standard Deduction
customer_reviews.text: You should know that if your state allows you to Itemize even though you took the standard deduction on the Federal you will have to file a paper return for state. In Wisconsin have to redo the federal as itemized and submit it with notation on top as "Itemized for Wisconsin Return" with the paper Wisconsin return. Never a notation in the 2018 return in Turbo tax so now have to go back and amend state return
customer_reviews.author: Glenn E Shong

customer_reviews.title: LICENSE CODE NOT FOUND
customer_reviews.text: The software when installed is asking for License code which could either be on the packing list, packaging or the CD itself. However, there's no packing list and license code is neither found on the packaging or CD itself.
customer_reviews.author: Mod

customer_reviews.title: Turbtax Home and Business does not handle sale of business with required Form 8594
customer_reviews.text: I have used Turbotax "Home and Business" for many years, and it has served me well in the past. However, Turbotax "Home and Business" will not currently handle the sale for a businsess with goodwill and a non-compete agreement, Form 8594. I confirmed this in the Turbotax discussion community in multiple discussions. This is a major flaw in the program. A "business" tax software for "sole proprietors" should be handle the sale of a business and complete the Form 8594 for electronic filing. That said, Turbotax "Business" does handle the 8594, but Turbotax "Business" is for partnerships and corporations.
customer_reviews.author: Everette B. Orr

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase
customer_reviews.text: Got the CD in one day which included both Windows and MAC installs. Installation was easy without any issues. Registration was annoying (why the extra step?) but the code worked. I've been using TurboTax for many years now so the flow is easy and seamless.
customer_reviews.author: Trang Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Tax Software.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a sole proprietor and should get an accountant, but choose to try to save money each year doing my own taxes. I've used this software previously. I ordered it and it was as described and arrived as scheduled. No complaints. Price was ok. Cheaper than new in local store but a bit more than used on Ebay. I had no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Aubs

customer_reviews.title: Does great on federal; could use improvement on state.
customer_reviews.text: The process is pretty straight forward. I had a couple of questions and couldn't find answers; that's why tech support received a single star. TurboTax will prepare returns for one state for free, but you have to pay extra to e-file that state return using TurboTax. Colorado offers free file online. You can use the state forms that TurboTax prepares to complete most of the Colorado online return fields. My issue was with AMT. I eventually was able to figure out where to enter the appropriate amount in the appropriate form so that the online result matched the TurboTax results:.
customer_reviews.author: Chaz

customer_reviews.title: Installation Problems and Slow Software This Year
customer_reviews.text: I have been using TurboTax Home and Office for several years. The 2019 version is the first version I had problems installing. I had to uninstall and reinstall the product, but the first installation was corrupted and took a while to uninstall. The whole process took over one hour and was quite frustrating. Once I got the program running, I found that it is very sluggish compared to past year versions. There are a lot of “circle” icons I have to stare at as the program slowly grinds through a process.
customer_reviews.author: AusDevAri

customer_reviews.title: No free filing
customer_reviews.text: This year I did a regular 1040 and because of that, it offered no electronic filing for free. I have used TurboTax for over 20 years and this new restriction was disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Birdlover

customer_reviews.title: It's a good product BUT . . .
customer_reviews.text: It's a good product BUT . . . if you do not need it fill out 1099 misc for YOUR subcontractors then TT-Delux is all I need. The one year I need it for 1099's it was cheaper to by this than Deluxe and a separate 1099 program. I tried asking a question on a web page but I have no idea how to do that. You can read other peoples questions but not post one of your own unless maybe you can only ask questions through the program which seems stupid if that's true. I sure do miss the use-net newsgroups . . .
customer_reviews.author: Hap

customer_reviews.title: Hate to Love
customer_reviews.text: TurboTax is definitively a love to hate / hate to love company. Their software works great. Easy to use. With importing last year's return, it makes things very easy. Some things like rollovers and roth contributions can get very complicated quickly. Since these are common deductions, but still poorly implemented features. Biggest gripe with Turbotax is their lobbying. They intentionally keep the tax code complicated to ensure we need their software.
customer_reviews.author: DHO

customer_reviews.title: Overall, it works well.
customer_reviews.text: I've used TurboTax for several years for my very small on-line business and personal tax returns. With tax laws getting more stringent and more complex by the year, even TurboTax isn't as intuitive as I'd like it to be. For me, I'd like more instruction on certain things, but overall, it has worked well for my needs. The software itself works great. The only thing I've noticed is that if you need go backwards, it doesn't always seem to save the choices. To be sure, i frequently "Save" from the drop down choices.
customer_reviews.author: MsT

customer_reviews.title: For small businesses this is one of the necessary purchases
customer_reviews.text: Don't forget to remember to add this purchase to next year's taxes as a business write off. Been using turbotax for many years and it makes a long and stressful process a little less long and a lot less stressful. Just keep looking at those "?" and read and do the audit at the end to make sure you didn't mess up anything. Go over from the beginning again and then spot check the next day. Then spot check again the next day and then submit and pay. Sometimes you have to give your brain and eyes a rest in between when you have a lot of stuff to add.
customer_reviews.author: Tyr Na Nog

customer_reviews.title: TurboTax is the best!
customer_reviews.text: My second year using TurboTax and I am still very impressed. It knows what questions to ask and does NOT charge you more for using the various schedules privately owned businesses require for your tax filing. It offered to do State filing but I live in Nevada with no state income tax. After overpaying taxes two years ago (my accountant showed I owed $4000+ dollars) because he didn't know how to file RIDESHARE taxes. TurboTax does! I got refunds from last years and this one.
customer_reviews.author: Shayne Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Problem with updating and e filing
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used turbo tax throughout the years. This is the first year I’m having trouble efiling! It says I didn’t update the program. I update the program before I use it each and every time! Very confusing! Contacted customer support last night. They gave me a website they said should fix it. I will try it later.
customer_reviews.author: CHRIS

customer_reviews.title: After 15 years with TurboTax this year they've gone cheap street on mac users. Don't buy.....
customer_reviews.text: The tech help was befuddled, admitted that they couldn't solve the tech glitches, and gave me some stupid directions to create a new administrator (which only created more issues). So here I am, thought I filed my returns, paid my taxes due, and I haven't seen anything from IRS or State that they received my returns. AND when talking to TurboCrap Techies they couldn't tell me why. Having purchased this product 15 years now, and postponing my taxes until recently, I can't return the damn product. But, There Are Other Ways To Get Back At Those Crooks and this is the first. Do not buy into this scam. This is not your dad's turbotax. They are probably owned by China,,,,,,,
customer_reviews.author: whitehaired country boy

customer_reviews.title: Installed fine on my Windows 7 machine
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit worried since Turbo tax was saying Windows 7 wouldn't be supported however it installed fine and is running great. Every time you use it there is a pop up warning box about it which is TOTALLY annoying but just click stay with Win7 and it goes on and does what it's supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia H.

customer_reviews.title: reliable ,fast.
customer_reviews.text: This product is great. I've been using TurboTax for over 20 years.. I find it as reliable as the pay services that charge you by the sheet , but a lot cheaper. Follow the guided system and it will ask you all the questions needed to file. The 800 number is reliable for answers. Remember if you just have a simple return check online there are lots of free services available for federal and state returns.
customer_reviews.author: John a

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work on older versions of Mac OS
customer_reviews.text: This version requires Mac OS 10.13 High Sierra, or it simply WON'T WORK. And, when you run the program, it warns you that you better upgrade to Mac OS 10.14 Mojave for next year. This leaves stranded many Mac users who are using older versions of Mac OS (El Capitan is only 5 years old), or using Mac computers that are older which simply won't run the later versions of Mac OS. Other tax software programs will run on older OS versions (H&R Block will run on OS X 10.9 Mavericks, from 2013), so why must TurboTax be so restrictive?
customer_reviews.author: Joe P

customer_reviews.title: Works for a while, then won't start after system reboot
customer_reviews.text: This product worked for a while, but after every system reboot it asked for the license key again. Finally it quit working even to that point and all I see is the spinning dots forever. Contacted support and they even sent me a new download which does the same thing on the first launch. Internet is working fine. All intuit.com dns lookups work, firewall is disabled. It really doesn't matter how good the software is, if you can't run it.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Freil

customer_reviews.title: Terrible this year!
customer_reviews.text: I buy Turbo tax for my sister who does taxes every year for out family. This was the worst one yet. She had such a hard time with it. She had to contact the company several times and it took days to fix. Not worth it. If you can, just file your taxes with the free online Turbo tax.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: There is NO support at Turbo Tax!
customer_reviews.text: I will NEVER use this product again! Turbo Tax is a rip off! I have a couple of things on the personal return that are not calculating deductions, etc. properly. When I called support, they told me "we don't do business support other than to navigate the program"! BEWARE!!!
customer_reviews.author: DDay

customer_reviews.title: A taxing situation made easy.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Turbo Tax Home and Business since its inception and found it gets easier to use each year. It saves my business a couple hundred dollars every year just in tax prep fees, most wanted $600 to do my taxes!). Even though I'm not a trained accountant, using Turbo Tax has made me feel confident every year about doing my taxes, especially with it's self audit feature. I will use it as long as it's available..
customer_reviews.author: photo dude

customer_reviews.title: More problematic than past year.
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product for a number of years and seldom had a problem. However, this year I experienced several problems that tech support was able to help with but problems I had never had in the past. It may have been I use windows 7 which it will no longer support or a program glitch. Rather than buy another computer next year, I probably will try another company.
customer_reviews.author: L. Neubauer

customer_reviews.title: Old-Timer: Continue to Use
customer_reviews.text: I like the seamless transfer of previous year's information. I like the questionnaire even though I've used TurboTax for years - less likely to forget something or enter the amount in the wrong location. What I don't like, may I say resent, is the additional fee to file with the state. It feels like "gotcha." I'm always tempted to use a different program rather than pay the fee.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur H. Roach

customer_reviews.title: Easy to download!
customer_reviews.text: I got a version of CD & Download (Mac/Win), actually I can't install the CD but I need both MAC & WIN for my families, I hope there's a version of Download for MAC/WIN, then we can save the cost of delivery & CD. Anyway, it's easy to download & install, so I give 5 stars. One more thought, may they sell a version of only 2 or 3 e-filing at Lower price? Barely people need 5 e-Filing......
customer_reviews.author: Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to use
customer_reviews.text: I got almost finished with my return.... looked like I was getting a $400+ refund. The whole thing crashed. I began over again.... this resulted in a payment due of $2000+. I've struggled with understanding this program for the last 3 years. I'm done.... went to a tax person this year.... and will continue to do so. Turbo Tax was a waste of my time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Defective Disk - no return as I bought more than 60 days ago.
customer_reviews.text: I unwrapped my disk on March 30th. put it into the computer - it said defective disk. Amazon won't take it back & neither will Turbo Tax. $65 down the drain for buying too early (Jan 13th.)
customer_reviews.author: D. H. ARNOLD

customer_reviews.title: Big Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: Much more inconvenient to use than H&R Block, but the kicker was that the program caused my MacBook Pro to reboot multiple times. I gave up and bought H&R Block to complete my returns.
customer_reviews.author: halfracer

customer_reviews.title: I go to Turbotax every year
customer_reviews.text: I use turbotax every year. I used to do it all by hand and wading through all the badly written instructions on tax forms is a nightmare. Since i've used turbotax, I've had no contact with the IRS. Big benefit.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Tomporowski

customer_reviews.title: Been using TurboTax for decades
customer_reviews.text: Amazon special price got them the sale. Been using it for decades, with previous year saved starting out for the new year is easy. Does the job for us, never have used a competitor and see no reason to. Never used tech support in all these years, it's easy to use now because it is consistent in design and functions. Accuracy? Haven't found any issues.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: ReActivation Headache
customer_reviews.text: TT has a new activation code that allows one to use up to 5 times on 5 different computers or the same one if one had to reinstall their operating system ... unfortunately, the program keeps asking for the code on the same pc over and over again to the point where your 5 time usage is gone! Therefore, the program is now useless. Money Back Please !!!!
customer_reviews.author: NG Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: It's turbotax
customer_reviews.text: I didn't experience serial key issue like many of people reported on here. I guess they listened and fixed the issue. Otherwise, any call to their support is waste of time & money on their side. It has both PC & Mac versions in the CD. Perfect for my family to share the software since we are using different OS
customer_reviews.author: Wowotoe2

customer_reviews.title: Easy and quick
customer_reviews.text: Have used TurboTax for a long time. They are making it more difficult to do taxes every year and you are getting less back because of the law changes they are making.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Easy tool for filing Home and Business
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this software for many years and have always felt good about the returns I have filed, and so has the IRS I guess since no audits have ensued. It's easy to use, comprehensive, and well supported, although I've never had to use Tech support. Also it's a good tool if you have multiple returns to file.
customer_reviews.author: C. Smiley

customer_reviews.title: Did you know with this version you can ask for a CPA,
customer_reviews.text: Did you know you can ask for a CPA with this version. If you are entering a K1 you will need the help of a CPA due to the way the software works, maybe some day Intuit will fix this. Most professional tax programs cost many 1,000 of dollars to this is a bargain just get help entering the K1. Audit defense works great too and you get a CPA for that also.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher W Wachs

customer_reviews.title: Turbo Tax Home and Buiness 2019 works right out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: The program was easy to install and to populate the 2019 Turbo Tax forms with my 2018 data. I was able to get a good estimate for my Federal Income Tax for 2019 using the program. Once up and running the program updated itself with new IRS forms. The form for sales tax has not been issued (minor point). I have used Turbo Tax for years and highly recommend it for home and business. I have had an S Corp for years and never had issues with the business tax section.
customer_reviews.author: J L Baker

customer_reviews.title: Turbo tax Personnel and Business
customer_reviews.text: It works ok. Does not cover the whole tax sheets, had to ask it to jump to areas that it never asked about or covered. Kinda pricey! I think the software is written for tax accounts as it will ask question that you have to research to figure out how to answer. Just not that easy to use and understand.
customer_reviews.author: T. Black

customer_reviews.title: Well Its a Tax Software So...
customer_reviews.text: It was in no way "Turbo" so very disappointed. It is in fact very boring unless your one of those people who gets turned on by numbers. Bunch of Sickos. Maybe racing stripes or vroom noises would spice it up? Perhaps a animated reward screen when you complete a section like kids software. "Congratulations, You just got screwed by the government!!" and you just paid for software to tell you how much you owe! How weird is that.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Good software but not competitively priced
customer_reviews.text: Loaded with no problems. Transferred data from prior year without incident. Nicely organized with good prompts if something is missing or seems incorrect. Having to pay for state e-file is annoying given the higher price of this software compared to other suppliers. Likely will give competitor a try next year.
customer_reviews.author: D. Craig

customer_reviews.title: Continually hanging up
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if I got a bad disc or what, but this software just keeps hanging up on me. I've never had this problem before with TurboTax. I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: rm

customer_reviews.title: Already rated this. DO NOT PURCHASE. Second year of no support.
customer_reviews.text: Second year of no support. Home and Business has flaws per Block. Hours on the phone with no results. I bought Turbo Tax equivalent with no migration issues. Been using Block for years and they could have cared less if my issue installing and migrating was resolved. I DO NOT recommend this version.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Helpful for taxes, but less performant
customer_reviews.text: It is an example of how a small issue generates frustrations. Since last years, when you check the updates details (that are displayed by the software) you are sent to a link that does not exist. A lot of complains about and no answer from the developers. Anyway, in the latest 15 years, it was a single excellent version. (Maybe they laid off that team because of their very good job).
customer_reviews.author: Costello

customer_reviews.title: Software makes mystery error
customer_reviews.text: The software shows a salary although I entered zero. I have spent three hours with tech support but it has only been reduced in half.
customer_reviews.author: Lean Sensei

customer_reviews.title: extra charges to efile state, late updates to fix bugs that push you later filing than you want
customer_reviews.text: Seems like the hay days of Turbotax are gone. The software does not seem to help as much with understanding what options you have. It just gives you the options but no clue on the implications. Constant updates which you would expect is good, but not when they are for bugs. Links to tell you what changed don't actually give you the changes. You have to hunt for information. You have to worry that the fixes will cause you to amend your return, so you end up pushing off filing. Always pushing you to more expensive versions. The company seems to be more about profit than customers. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: NAME

customer_reviews.title: typical
customer_reviews.text: Typical TT. Sometimes it follows the right order, and asks the right questions. Sometimes it does not. Probably as good as any other product out there. But they do need to improve some things. It has been awhile since I did the taxes, so I can't remember it all.
customer_reviews.author: G-Man

customer_reviews.title: I save so much money doing my own business taxes.
customer_reviews.text: You don't have to be an accountant to use Turbo Tax. It walks you through every single step, just like having an accountant by your side. I use Turbo Tax every year and it's so easy. The hard part is taking the time to organize paperwork and adding up all the receipts to put into the program.
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenne

customer_reviews.title: Must have updated operating system so unable to use and no refund
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't list this information as a requirement, but you must have a particular updated version of an operating system to download the software. I did not have a problem last year. Now, I can't use the product and had to simply do my taxes online and cannot get a refund. So I'm paying twice for Turbotax service. I won't use again.
customer_reviews.author: Masonda

customer_reviews.title: Recommend for dong your own taxes
customer_reviews.text: Having been using Turbo Tax for 10+ years to do my own taxes for my business and personal taxes as well as for friends and family. I am a semi-retired accountant. Turbo tax is accurate, easy to use for the non-professional and provides knowledgeable support if needed. My only issue is the extra cost for each additional state $40 per state can get costly for military and others who jobs take them to 2 or most re states per year.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Boucher

customer_reviews.title: It's user friendly
customer_reviews.text: I've used TurboTax for many years and every year I'm glad I do. Pulls prior year's tax return from backup so all info is readily available. Provides step by step input or you choose the category you are ready to enter. Allows you to flag a topic or entry that will need follow-up. Additional explanations provided for clarity lets you be assured of what you're entering.
customer_reviews.author: KathyR

customer_reviews.title: Taxes made easy!
customer_reviews.text: It does everything I need, and I am sure my taxes are correct when I am done. It does retirement, earned income, investments, royalties, and home business all for less than $80 a year. The effort I put into it is about the same as if I was taking this to a tax service.
customer_reviews.author: GR8TREK

customer_reviews.title: Activation code does not work well
customer_reviews.text: This was a good program but the online code activation did not work well. After entering code the program kept asking me to renter it again and said it was already used. When rebooting sometimes it works fine other times it would lock me out and ask again for the code. I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Does not actually support Business Tax Returns!
customer_reviews.text: This is actually deceptive advertising to call this "Home & Business". This product cannot do any business tax returns - it can only do personal tax returns. I called TurboTax and they refused to do anything about it and insisted that I buy a second product in addition to the first one; the second product is called "Business". They were very rude to me, refused to give me a refund, and then actually hung up on me when I complained about it.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars As It Gets My Taxes Right
customer_reviews.text: While my taxes are not super complicated, I like to do them myself and over the years I have developed a reasonably solid understanding of the tax code. They few times I have used other products they do not get the taxes right. TurboTax does year after year.
customer_reviews.author: SBC97223

customer_reviews.title: TurboTax Home & Business
customer_reviews.text: Until they stopped supporting Windows 7 and older Macs this was a great product. Now you must use Windows 10 or recent Macintosh. I would have to buy a new computer to use it. Other Tax products are as good and without the computer restrictions.
customer_reviews.author: A. Greech

customer_reviews.title: it worked for me last year
customer_reviews.text: I like submitting my taxes and not having to pay an accountant $250 to save me $5, like happened several years in a row before I started using TurboTax.
customer_reviews.author: B. Lightfoot

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: I have been using turbo tax for 18 years. It is an easy program to use, just answer all the questions and if you need some document you can quit and come back where you left off. The tech support is great the chat feature they have you on your way in a hurry. I highly recomend this.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth L

customer_reviews.title: Good for Self Employed
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this since 2004. It is great if you are self employed. Only one problem all these years, I and others have complained about over the years, you can't print the current page you are working on, IE: Highlight want you want to print and print selection. Otherwise a great selection for Home & Business.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: More errors and slower every year.
customer_reviews.text: I have an old PC, but Ethernet connection to high speed internet. Every year the software is slower. I have used TurboTax for more than 20 years, but this may be the last. Every year, there seems to be more errors. I have to print out the forms and go through each on carefully to find the mistakes. The only reason I keep using it is the history it has. I am getting close to being able to fill the forms out faster in pdf!
customer_reviews.author: TWB

customer_reviews.title: The constant updating and activation issues make this software next to useless.
customer_reviews.text: The software should update once per week, and should be activated only once. It has asked to be activated many times now, and finding the CD and the document is extremely irritating. Microsoft asks me once in a blue moon. This constant activation forces you to scan the activation document. The activation code is also unclear and the difference between numbers and letters not sufficient and prone to misreading.
customer_reviews.author: FB

customer_reviews.title: Turbo Tax makes filing easier
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for years now and we have never had any issues. It is easy to download or install and it walks you thru all the steps. Plus, it will download the information from the prior year so that makes it very convenient for us.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a fine program. However, while the federal e-filing is included, you have to pay $24+ to e-file the state return. If it’s going to include one state, the e-filing should be included. Don’t get me wrong. The convenience is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Santos

customer_reviews.title: TurboTax 2019 on Windows 10.
customer_reviews.text: TurboTax 2019 on Windows 10 will not allow me to update my self employment tax. It reminded me over and over that the update was missing and still would not let me insert it. What am I to do? How am I to file a completed tax return?
customer_reviews.author: G. Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Wish for flat tax.
customer_reviews.text: Aha, it's tax time😡. So far have used TTax just tackes time. Need the flat tax.
customer_reviews.author: Brian R.

customer_reviews.title: Makes filing taxes pretty easy
customer_reviews.text: Turbotax asks you simple questions in plain English to prepare your tax return, and makes recommendations for minimizing your taxes. With Turbotax, the hardest part of filing your taxes is organizing all your receipts and documents!
customer_reviews.author: Miki B.

customer_reviews.title: It’s turbo tax, best selling tax software, overpriced and mostly works...
customer_reviews.text: It’s turbo tax, best selling tax software, overpriced and mostly works. Don’t try to get support.
customer_reviews.author: Mike D

customer_reviews.title: No problems
customer_reviews.text: I have been a 20+ year user of this product however I was leery about purchasing this year because of negative reviews related to downloading updates and Win10 compatibility but everything went smoothly for us.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. J

customer_reviews.title: Used for 15 years
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used turbo tax for maybe 15 years. The cost of this keeps increasing yearly. This is the first version that became annoying with the repeated need to enter the password for the software use. Other than that, I will continue using this for our business and avoid tax preparers cost.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Meyers

customer_reviews.title: I keep on using TurboTax and am satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I have now been using TurboTax for about 5 years. Each time, I am satisfied with the experience. This time, there were issues with installation (my fault), and the company's tech support person was very polite and helpful.
customer_reviews.author: T Roe

customer_reviews.title: good tax program
customer_reviews.text: this version is good but the needed version of federal tax for reporting estates is way to expensive in order to file one simple estate return. guess maybe the owners need a lot of money and r not willing to have a simple estate version ready for users.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Robinett

customer_reviews.title: Didn't come with a activation code.
customer_reviews.text: This product didn't come with an activation code. I wasn't able to complete my taxes with this software. I had to use the online version directly from turbotax for more money. This product sold by Amazon was a complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Don Draper

customer_reviews.title: Installed with no problems on Windows 7.
customer_reviews.text: Installed with no problems on Windows 7.Did not experience any insulation problems as others have reported. I have done my tax return and experience no problems whatsoever. Would order again in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: Joan E.

customer_reviews.title: Easy enough to use.
customer_reviews.text: Its easy enough to use to do your taxes. Although I think its pretty cheesy that they want to charge you to submit a state filing (they should allow you to do one state per software purchase).
customer_reviews.author: Sidney & Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Great, albeit expensive product
customer_reviews.text: We’ve been using TurboTax for years. We’re not confident that we’re getting the best results, but confident that we’re at least accurate. Feels overly expensive, but like the best/easiest player in town
customer_reviews.author: larz

customer_reviews.title: Requires Internet connection every time it is used
customer_reviews.text: I installed, and I needed to connect to the Internet for activation. OK. But every time I start it up, Turbotax again demands that I connect to the Internet, or it will not start. I don't want my Windows computer on the Internet while I'm doing taxes. This is not acceptable, and next year I will be trying one of the competitors' products.
customer_reviews.author: RRR.MN

customer_reviews.title: The best tax software
customer_reviews.text: Been using for many years. Only tax software to trust.
customer_reviews.author: DG

product_meta.title: TurboTax Home & Business + State 2019 Tax Software [Amazon Exclusive] [PC/Mac Disc]
product_meta.description: TurboTax Home & Business is recommended if you received income from a side job or are self-employed, an independent contractor, freelancer, consultant or sole proprietor, you prepare W-2 and 1099 MISC forms for employees or contractors, you file your personal and self-employed tax together (if you own an S Corp, C Corp, Partnership or multiple-owner LLC, choose TurboTax Business). TurboTax is tailored to your unique situation-it will search for the deductions and credits you deserve, so you're confident you'll get your maximum refund • TurboTax coaches you every step of the way and double checks your return as you go to handle even the toughest tax situations, so you can be confident you're getting every dollar you deserve. • Every year it gets even easier. As a returning customer, TurboTax will automatically transfer last year's data to help ensure accuracy and save you time • Up-to-date with the latest tax laws-so you can be confident your taxes will be done right. • Help along the way-get answers to your product questions, so you won't get stuck. • Your information is safeguarded - TurboTax uses encryption technology, so your tax data is protected while it's e-filed to IRS and state agencies
feature_bullets: TurboTax Home & Business + State is recommended to maximize your deductions for personal and self employed tax situations especially if you received income from a side job
Best for those who are self-employed or an independent contractor, freelancer, consultant or sole proprietor
MAXIMUM TAX REFUND- Searches for more than 350+ tax deductions and credits, including mortgage interest, property taxes and energy-efficient improvements, to get you everything you deserve
TAXES DONE RIGHT - TurboTax guides you through your tax preparation, keeping you up to date with the latest tax laws and double checking your entries along the way.
Includes 5 free federal e-files and one download of a TurboTax state product ($44.99 value) state e-file sold separately
Exclusively at Amazon, receive a free 1 year subscription to Quicken Starter Edition ($34.95 value) with your purchase of TurboTax
Free U.S. based TurboTax product support via phone
TRACK YOUR DONATIONS with Its Deductable from TurboTax- Turn charitable donations into big tax deductions
SAVE TIME- Automatically imports financial information including W-2s, mortgage and investment information as well as imports prior year tax return information from TurboTax and other tax software.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
